data.author: Darkenvy

changelog.release_notes: Initial release of the color version with the settings page issue of the [now legacy] version fixed.

data.description:
NOTE: Must install this Japanese language pack to work! Japanese is not natively supported by Pebble. http://wh.to/pebble/index_jp.html

WaniKani on your Pebble watch! Immerse yourself not only with the time, but your most difficult words. This app takes a snapshot of your WaniKani profile every hour to provide you with the most to date vocabulary throughout your . Currently grabs any words under 70% [correct] rating.

Tells the time, Shows your title & Level Shows Kanji, Hiragana and the definition Informs you of your current review count available Updates hourly & changes words upon every change to the screen.  

Notes: If you like the Japanese language pack, show your support to the developer. He performed much more work than I did and without his effort, this watch-face would not have come to fruition. 

This project is open source over on github. Donate if you enjoyed this app on paypal at darkenvy6@gmail.com .

https://github.com/darkenvy/TokeiTokei/

latest_release.release_notes: Initial release of the color version with the settings page issue of the [now legacy] version fixed.

data.title: WaniKani TokeiTokei
